title: Add Dilated Transpose convolution routines
body_html:
(PR against v0.2.0)

  • Adds 2d and 3d dilated full convolution.
  • removes output_padding / adjH restrictions from col2im (2D case). This was needed for ConvBackwardBackward
  • Fix various bugs in ConvBackwardBackward and enable gradgradcheck tests
  • remove a bunch of python dead code
body_text:
(PR against v0.2.0)

Adds 2d and 3d dilated full convolution.
removes output_padding / adjH restrictions from col2im (2D case). This was needed for ConvBackwardBackward
Fix various bugs in ConvBackwardBackward and enable gradgradcheck tests
remove a bunch of python dead code
body:
(PR against v0.2.0)

- Adds 2d and 3d dilated full convolution.
- removes output_padding / adjH restrictions from col2im (2D case). This was needed for ConvBackwardBackward
- Fix various bugs in ConvBackwardBackward and enable gradgradcheck tests
- remove a bunch of python dead code
